Session Notes

Source: Campaign Source Notes.

Highlights

  • Recap:Either by the blessing of Old Mother or a greater being (AKA Liz forgetting her spell rules?) we made short work of the previous battle. We went to the saloon and met our bastion assistants. We ate the soup served at the 4 star sal...
  • Billy gives us some items from the last battle we missed and then gives us citizenship documentation so that we can vote for him.
  • Veteran's Cane Wondrous Item, common As a Bonus Action, you can transform this walking cane into an ordinary Longsword or change the Longsword back into a walking cane. In either case, you must be holding the item. GAVE TO LILYBLOSSUM
  • Periapt of Proof against Poison Wondrous Item, rare (requires attunement) This delicate silver chain has a brilliant-cut black gem pendant. While you wear it, you have Immunity to the Poisoned condition and Poison damage Notes: Immunity:...
  • KIV TAKES HEALING POTION
  • Oz gets black token
  • Walking in a void surrounded by nothing but blackness. Doesn’t even feel air or ground beneath his feet. Feels like he is suffocating but doesn’t have the physical symptoms. Hears a voice. Hears “The Other One”. It says “Hey Oz, or shoul...
  • (above table, how can The Other One like read his mind? Can’t but knows everything that has happened
  • Kiv, in the sanctuary of Old Mother. Had just brought in Jessica who had fled a bandit attack on her camp. Part of my duties was feeding and bathing the infirm. I see that Jessica is gone. Bedding was tied up into a makeshift rope, ancho...
  • Bart gets a black token. In jail cell. Has someone talking to him with a trinket in the shape of an eye - he attempts to hypnotize Bart but it doesn’t work. “I’m going to make you the same offer that I tried to make a friend” “Yes but it...
  • “You’re twisted man, but I will find you, and I will kill you”
  • We all wonder how we forgot about such important memories until now…
  • We see as we’re talking that the sun just moves to full noon in an instant (like this force can control the SUN but not us).
  • We board the blimp. Notice there’s been some improvements. It’s faster and more sturdy.
